properties.name: Backpackers: Plantation Village Hostel
properties.description: Posted by Ianline I stayed here for a while. I loved it! The community was really nice, fun and active. I met a lot of cool people here and had a great time. In the winter time this is an excelent place to stay. This hostel is only a little ways from the northshore\'s Pipeline and the opposite direction is the Waimea Beach Park which is down river from some really awesome waterfalls.

properties.name: Beach Camping at the Lost TV Show Set.
properties.description: Posted by Ianline   I camped out on the beach here for a few nights. One tip of advice when camping... Don\'t camp near a movie or TV show set... They keep really bright lights on at night. I camped out next to the plane crash set for the TV show Lost. Cool set, I walked around looking at it durring the days when no one was there. It looked very real and convincing. In fact, when I first saw it I think I muttered a few words of surprise of seeing a plane wreck.

properties.name: Beppu, Japan
properties.description: Posted by IanlineWhen I traveled to Japan I had the most fun in Beppu. I stayed in a really crappy hotel... I woke up with cockroaches in bed with me. :) But, I didn\'t find any evidence that they bit me. So, I didn\'t really mind.

properties.name: Broken Iraqi Fighter Jets
properties.description: Posted by Ianline The aftermath of a lot of weapons... Abandoned military airport.

properties.name: Camping at Silver Lake, MI
properties.description: Posted by Ianline  This was a camping trip with a bunch of friends and their family\'s. My dad came along on this venture.

properties.name: Clark House
properties.description: Posted by IanlineThis was Rachel Krause\'s & Sarah Green\'s old house thye rented. I used to stay the night on their couch now & then.

properties.name: Courtyard Marriott: Downtown Toronto, ON
properties.description: Posted by IanlineMy brother & dad took my to Toronto, ON for my 19th birthday. I loved it! it was so freaking sweet! I love Toronto!!!

properties.name: DFC (Detroit Film Center)
properties.description: Posted by Ianline 1227 Washington Blvd, Detroit, MI

properties.name: Dad's Arizona House
properties.description: Posted by IanlineMy dad owned this house for only a few months. He moved there, repaired the house and then ended up moving back to Michigan. But, I got to stay here for a while. It is a very sweet house. Very big and very open.

properties.name: Eddie's
properties.description: Posted by Ianlinemany nights after and before filming had I slept on Eddie\'s couch. It isn\'t very comfortable and he doesn\'t have extra blankets. But, when you are tired enough you can sleep anywhere.

properties.name: Galambus House
properties.description: Posted by IanlineThe couch has seen me for many naps at my second family\'s house.

properties.name: Grandma & Grandpa Karber's
properties.description: Posted by IanlineMy grandparent\'s place on my mom\'s side. Good old El Paso, TX!

properties.name: Jared's
properties.description: Posted by IanlineSometimes we would head on over to Jared\'s house and stay up hella late dicking around.

properties.name: Krause House
properties.description: Posted by IanlineI grew up at this house! My other second family\'s home! But, they moved. :(

properties.name: Lost
properties.description: Posted by IanlineThe TV show Lost is filmed here. This is the beach where the set for the crashed plane is at. I was camping out on that beach next to it for a few nights.

properties.name: My Home!
properties.description: Posted by IanlineThis is where I lay myself to sleep most of the time.

properties.name: Phoenix Theatre
properties.description: Posted by Ianline 30170 Grand River Ave Farmington Hills, MI 48336

properties.name: Polynesian Hostel Beach Club
properties.description: Posted by Ianline  I stayed here a few nights when I was on a very fun, sweet vacation. Not too shabby. Nice location.

properties.name: Residence Inn by Marriott: Chicago, IL
properties.description: Posted by Ianline I went to Chicago, IL with my friend\'s Aaron and Rachel. We stayed here. Chicago was pretty fun, a bit windy and a bit chilly when we went. But, it was fun!

properties.name: Sleeping Under Fuller Rd. Bridge
properties.description: Posted by IanlineSo, my friend is a vagabond. He stopped by last night and I drove him to Ann Arbor. We hung out for a while and then I was like, "where are you guys staying?" (Him, his girlfriend and their dog). They said they were going to sleep under a bridge. I was like, "Cool. I think I\'ll stay the night there with you." And they were like, "Right on dude!" So, there was a colony of home bums (people who build little houses or live in tents) all set up. This one dude was pretty cool. He gave us a mattress to sleep on. It smelt sorta funky, but, I had a sheet and two blankets, so that was cool. Anyway, we got some 40\'s (Camo & Mickey\'s Ice) and drank away as we sat there talking about shit. It was sweet. Then morning came... The question was, are we going to get up and walk in the rain to a church that serves breakfast at 7:30 or are we going to stay under the warm sleeping bags and blankets. We stayed there for a while. Then I had to go to school. It was a fun time.

properties.name: Tammy's Appartment
properties.description: Posted by IanlineThis is my sister\'s place. The family stay\'s here when we come to visit. My sister is really cool.

properties.name: The Davids
properties.description: Posted by IanlineThis family is so freaking sweet. My friend Rachel moved in with them and I helped her move. I stayed there for a few days unpacking her stuff and running around town getting things with her. It was a fun time.

properties.name: The Walnut House
properties.description: Posted by IanlineMy home away from home in Lansing, MI. My good friend Andrew Marshall moved to Lansing. I head up there now and then and stay for a weekend. I used to stay for a week at a time in the summer. Fun times with good friends.

properties.name: Tokyo Marriott Hotel Kinshicho Tobu
properties.description: Posted by Ianline tokyo, japanMy dad and I stayed at this gianormous hotel for a night. It was really nice looking. It also had a nice look out on the city.

properties.name: Violet's Appartment
properties.description: Posted by Ianlineann arbor, miI\'ve napped at my ex-girlfriends a bunch of times. Her carpet is very nice to nap on.

properties.name: Violet's New House
properties.description: Posted by IanlineViolet\'s new house has received a nice 5 hour, in the middle of the day, nap session by me. "It was really boring" Violet said. He, I was tired! I like to sleep!

properties.name: Washtenaw Community College
properties.description: Posted by IanlineI slept in the parking lot of my school a couple of times. I was driving back from Lansing late at night, or early in the morning. I decided that since one of my classes started in 3 hours that it was useless to drive home, so I decided to sleep in my car until class. Some nights were very cold. One night a security guard knocked on my window asking if I was okay, really checking to see if I was still alive; my car was running.
